entry.title: Help wanted: translations
entry.summary: In this email conversation, Geir Harald Hansen and Nils Schneider discuss the coordination of translation efforts for Bitcoin. Geir requests that Norwegian Bokm√•l be added to the list of languages on Transifex, a platform for translations. Nils suggests that any user can add a translation by clicking on "add translation" and provides a link to the project's Transifex page. Geir agrees to translate the language with code "nb." In addition, the conversation ends with a sponsored ad from Cisco promoting their self-assessment program for IT networking professionals.
